sentences.english: Typically, design codes are based on one specific set of units.

sentences.english: It was recommended that the annual maximum value method is worth to accept by the design code.

sentences.english: Compile Group of Code for Design of Steel Structure.
The seismic zoning map is the basic information for compiling code for seismic design of any kind of structures.

sentences.english: I think it\\\'s less than satisfactory in design code enforcement.

sentences.english: The air duct must be designed and installed in accordance with national design code for HVAC duct.
sentences.chinese: 风管设计和安装必须符合国家暖通空调管道设计规范。
